location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed in Colour on PaperDimensions: 774 x 1000mm

mods.abstract: This map shows the communications infrastructure Iraq on two sheets, one for all of Iraq north of Baghdad, and another south of it. The map shows the country's major settlements and focuses on the communications routes comprised of roads, railways, and pipelines, but also includes proposed railways.
